# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Detective
The Detective is responsible for investigating crimes, and interrogating suspects. They have a collection of tools to assist them in their investigations. Ideally the Detective should work alongside the Security Officers and leave arrests to them, but can get involved in arrests if the situation requires it. Similarly, they should be prepared to take arms if the station is under attack.
## Do - Investigate crimes. - Interrogate suspects. - Use your tools to assist you. - Make yourself aware of Space Law. - Lead by example.
## Don't - Participate in arrests, leave that to the Security Officers, unless the situation requires it. - Act outside of the Alert Level (e.g. performing random searches while the station is Green).
